attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It was with some dismay but not suprise, that I noted all the heads of the banks who led us into the current financial crisis, facing the select committee this week, were Sir this and Sir that. Since it is the general taxpayer and their money who have come to the rescue like knights in shining armour, should we all not be knighted for OUR services to the nation. I for one look forward to my invitation to the palace.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
